content: in next st 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st change color to black 2dc in next st 2 times cut white leaving a tail to weave in 13dc r4 chain 2 double_crochet in first 2 sts change color to orange double_crochet in next st 2dc in next st double_crochet in next 2sts change color to black double_crochet in next st 2dc in next st change color to orange double_crochet in next st 2dc in next st double_crochet in next 2sts change color to black double_crochet in next 2sts 17dc r5 chain 2 2dc in first st double_crochet in next st change color to orange double_crochet in next st 2dc in next st double_crochet in next 3 sts change color to black double_crochet in next st 2dc in next st double_crochet in next st change color to orange double_crochet in next st 2dc in next st double_crochet in next 3 sts change color to black double_crochet in next st 2dc in next st cut orange leaving a tail to weave in 22dc r6 chain 3 2tr in first st treble_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st change color to yellow half_double_crochet in next 6sts change color to black double_crochet in next st 2tr in next st chain 2 2tr in next st double_crochet in next st change color to yellow half_double_crochet in next 6sts change color to black double_crochet in next st treble_crochet in next st 2tr in next st cut yellow leaving a tail to weave in 26st chain 2 r7 with black chain 1 single_crochet in each st with 2sc in first and last st and 4sc in chain 2 space cut black leaving a tail to weave in 32st see finishing steps above
